StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Genetics of Disorders Affecting Tooth Structure, Number, Morphology and Eruption: CIDR

Person.Organization: UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN AT ANN ARBOR

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The datasets used for the analyses described in this summary were obtained from dbGaP at https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/gap/cgi-bin/study.cgi?study_id=phs001491.v1.p1, through dbGaP accession number phs001491.v1.p1. Such datasets were generated as a result of the study "Genetics of Disorders Affecting Tooth Structure, Number, Morphology and Eruption: CIDR" funded by the National Institute of Dental and Craniofacial Research (NIDCR; grant number X01 HG008691). Genotyping services and assistance with genotype QC were funded by NIDCR, and provided by the Center for Inherited Disease Research (CIDR) and the University of Michigan through a federal contract from the National Institutes of Health (NIH) to The Johns Hopkins University, contract number HHSN268200782096C. Data and samples were obtained through: (1) the Dental Research Laboratory at the University of Michigan School of Dentistry, funded by grant R01 DE015846 from NIDCR; (2) the Istanbul University School of Dentistry; and (3) the National Taiwan University School of Dentistry.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: All data are approved for Health/Medical/Biomedical use. Data use limitations vary between the three consent groups. Data use for a given consent group must be consistent with the described data use limitations. The variant alleles and frequencies from the samples from the University of Michigan can be shared in public archives but only variant frequencies from the Turkey and NTUH samples can be shared.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution responded that the study is not sensitive without submitting a new Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: NTUH Taiwan Health/Medical/Biomedical (IRB, PUB, COL, NPU, MDS, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: NTUH-HMB-IRB-PUB-COL-NPU-MDS-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Documentation of a collaborative agreement with Dr. Yuan-Ling Lee at National Taiwan University must be provided; please contact Dr. Lee at: Graduate Institute of Clinical Dentistry National Taiwan University No. 1, Chang-Te St., Taipei 10048, Taiwan, R.O.C. Phone: 886-2-23123456 ext. 67337 Fax:886-2-23831346 E-mail: yuanlinglee@ntu.edu.tw

ConsentGroup.title: Turkey Health/Medical/Biomedical (IRB, PUB, COL, NPU, MDS, GSO)

ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Documentation of a collaborative agreement with Dr. Figen Seymen at Istanbul University must be provided; please contact Dr. Seymen at: Istanbul University, Faculty of Dentistry Department of Pediatric Dentistry 34093 Istanbul Turkey Phone:+905322462204 Fax: +90 212 5310515 Email: fseymen@istanbul.edu.tr

ConsentGroup.name: HMB
